articles.description: Ollie Pope leads England in place of captain Ben Stokes, who has been ruled out of the fifth Test against India starting at The Oval on Thursday.
articles.title: England vs India: Ben Stokes ruled out with injury, Ollie Pope to captain

articles.description: The lure of Australian Rules and rugby league in Australia means that the Wallabies will always have to fight for talent according to those on the ground down under.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions v Australia: Wallabies 'would dominate' without AFL & NRL talent drain

articles.description: Latest transfer news as Manchester City sign James Trafford, Nick Pope is linked with Manchester United and Newcastle move for Aaron Ramsdale.
articles.title: Transfer news: Man City re-sign James Trafford, Nick Pope linked with Man Utd & Aaron Ramsdale to Newcastle latest

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to BBC local radio commentaries from day two of the 11th round of the 2025 County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Day two - scores, radio commentary & live text

articles.description: Manchester United defender Luke Shaw backs head coach Ruben Amorim's hard-line approach to improving the "toxic" and "unhealthy" culture at the club.
articles.title: Manchester United: Luke Shaw backs Ruben Amorim's demands to improve culture

articles.description: Eric Trump - US President Donald Trump's son - says his father "deserves" to have his Turnberry course host The Open again.
articles.title: Donald Trump: US President 'deserves' to have The Open at Turnberry, says Eric Trump

articles.description: Showboating Kyren Wilson spurns the chance to make history when he attempted a no-look shot on the black in his 6-5 victory over Si Jiahui at the Shanghai Masters.
articles.title: Shanghai Masters: Kyren Wilson misses out on history after no-look black

articles.description: German champions Bayern Munich complete the £65.5m signing of Liverpool and Colombia winger Luis Diaz.
articles.title: Luis Diaz: Bayern Munich sign Liverpool winger in £65.5m deal

articles.description: Germany's double Olympic biathlon champion Laura Dahlmeier is "seriously injured" in a severe mountaineering accident in Pakistan.
articles.title: Laura Dahlmeier: Olympic star injured in climbing accident

articles.description: In leading his team to a series win in Australia, Lions captain Maro Itoje is congratulated by the legendary Willie John McBride.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Maro Itoje joins the list of Lions legends
